seisflows3.tools.err

Custom errors for Seisflows

Module Contents

exception seisflows3.tools.err.ParameterError(*args)

Bases: ValueError

A new ValueError class which explains the Parameter’s that threw the error

exception seisflows3.tools.err.CheckError(cls, par)

Bases: ValueError

An error called by the Check functions within each module, that returns the name of the class that raised the error, as well as the parameter in question.
